column4: Hi all, im rather noob on this thing but i need some help with x-server
what is that exactly?  You need help getting it setup?
hmm sry for bad english first :) It says something like "Cant start your x-server plz reconfigure" but in swedish :)
that might help you out.  and don't worry my english isn't so good either, and it's my native toungue :)
add sudo in front of that.
you can always do:  sudo su -   (allows you to become root)  and then do things as root.
ok its running.. now i have to select drivers... i have a ati card so i should select ati?
I saw something on here about ati before though.   Someone said they just released new ATI drivers for Linux.
Ok i have tested that already, ati and then vga nothing works
do you have another box?  that is online connected to the net at the moment?  (windows or another linux box?)
Im on my laptop now, and installing on another box
